name: Poco Cards
description:
Initially made for LudumDare 51. This game is a demo and its still in development, may be incomplete

Battles

Start with three cards in your hand and strategize to beat your opponent in this turn-based combat game.

Cards

The deck you equip determines your victory, unlock cards and build the best combination possible.

Collection

Collect 15+ cards!

World

Explore the island of your kingdom and fight against the most fearsome enemies.

Game Features
  • ⚔️ A fast & juicy turn-based combat system.
  • 🃏 15+ unique cards to collect.
  • ☠️ 3+ challenging bosses to defeat.
